sen.e: However, these lands were, in nature, not the state lands like the general kanden in the period from Song to mid-Ming which supported the national fisacal revenue, and except 学田, they were in the nature of private properties held by individuals who were permitted to use.

sen.j: 官田の消滅には、明代後半期から長江デルタ地帯を中心に各地で強まった、土地に対する公課負担均等化への社会的要請が大きい。
sen.e: The disappearance of kanden was mainly due to societal demand for equalization of taxes on land which spread through various regions including the delta of the Yangtze River as its center in the late Ming period.
